1. **topicsï¼ˆä¸»é¢˜è¡¨ï¼‰**
```sql
CREATE TABLE topics (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    description TEXT,
    created_at DATETIME NOT NULL,
    updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL
);
```

2. **modulesï¼ˆæ¨¡å—è¡¨ï¼‰**
```sql
CREATE TABLE modules (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    icon VARCHAR(255),
    order_index INT NOT NULL,
    topic_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (topic_id) REFERENCES topics(id)
);
```

3. **chaptersï¼ˆç« èŠ‚è¡¨ï¼‰**
```sql
CREATE TABLE chapters (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    chapter_number INT NOT NULL,
    order_index INT NOT NULL,
    module_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (module_id) REFERENCES modules(id)
);
```

4. **lecturesï¼ˆè¯¾ç¨‹è¡¨ï¼‰**
```sql
CREATE TABLE lectures (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    lecture_number INT NOT NULL,
    order_index INT NOT NULL,
    chapter_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (chapter_id) REFERENCES chapters(id)
);
```

5. **lecture_contentsï¼ˆè¯¾ç¨‹å†…å®¹è¡¨ï¼‰**
```sql
CREATE TABLE lecture_contents (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- COURSE, SIMPLIFIED, TEST, ADVANCED
    content LONGTEXT,
    lecture_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    created_at DATETIME NOT NULL,
    updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (lecture_id) REFERENCES lectures(id)
);
```

6. **user_progressï¼ˆç”¨æˆ·è¿›åº¦è¡¨ï¼‰**
```sql
CREATE TABLE user_progress (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    user_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    lecture_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
    completed_at DATETIME,
    last_accessed_at DATETIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (lecture_id) REFERENCES lectures(id)
);
```

2. Module(1) -> Chapter(å¤š)

```diff
+         .typing-indicator span:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
+     </style>
+ </head>

+                     <li class="nav-item">

+                 <div class="chat-container">
+                     <!-- èŠå¤©æ¶ˆæ¯åŒºåŸŸ -->
+                     <div class="chat-messages" id="chatMessages">
+                         <!-- AIæ¬¢è¿æ¶ˆæ¯ -->
+                         <div class="message ai">
+                             <div class="message-content">
+                                 <p>ä½ å¥½ï¼æˆ‘æ˜¯æ™ºå–µå­¦å ‚çš„AIåŠ©æ‰‹ã€‚æˆ‘å¯ä»¥å¸®ä½ ï¼š</p>
+                                 <ul>
+                                     <li>å›ç­”å„ç§å­¦ç§‘é—®é¢˜</li>

+                             <input type="text" class="form-control" id="messageInput" 
+                                    placeholder="è¾“å…¥ä½ çš„é—®é¢˜..." autocomplete="off">
+                             <button class="btn btn-primary" id="sendButton">
+                                 <i class="bi bi-send"></i> å‘é€
+                             </button>
+                         </div>
+                     </div>

+                         <div class="suggestion-item" data-question="ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½ï¼Ÿå®ƒçš„åº”ç”¨é¢†åŸŸæœ‰å“ªäº›ï¼Ÿ">
+                             <i class="bi bi-robot"></i> äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½åŠå…¶åº”ç”¨
+                         </div>
+                         <div class="suggestion-item" data-question="è¯·ä»‹ç»Pythonç¼–ç¨‹çš„åŸºç¡€çŸ¥è¯†å’Œåº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚">
+                             <i class="bi bi-code-square"></i> Pythonç¼–ç¨‹å…¥é—¨
+                         </div>
+                         <div class="suggestion-item" data-question="å¦‚ä½•æé«˜å­¦ä¹ æ•ˆç‡ï¼Ÿæœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆå¥½çš„å­¦ä¹ æ–¹æ³•æ¨èï¼Ÿ">

+     <!-- Bootstrap JS -->
+     <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/bootstrap/5.3.0/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
+     <!-- Marked.js for Markdown rendering -->
+     <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/marked/4.0.2/marked.min.js"></script>
+     <!-- è‡ªå®šä¹‰JS -->
+     <script src="../js/api.js"></script>
+     <script>
+         document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+             const chatMessages = document.getElementById('chatMessages');
+             const messageInput = document.getElementById('messageInput');
+             const sendButton = document.getElementById('sendButton');
+             const typingIndicator = document.getElementById('typingIndicator');
+             const recentQuestions = document.getElementById('recentQuestions');
+ 
+             // å­˜å‚¨æœ€è¿‘çš„é—®é¢˜
+             let recentQuestionsArray = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('recentQuestions') || '[]');
+ 
+             // æ›´æ–°æœ€è¿‘é—®é¢˜æ˜¾ç¤º
+             function updateRecentQuestions() {
+                 recentQuestions.innerHTML = recentQuestionsArray
+                     .slice(0, 5)
+                     .map(q => `
+                         <div class="suggestion-item" data-question="${q}">
+                             <i class="bi bi-arrow-return-right"></i> ${q}
+                         </div>
+                     `)
+                     .join('');
+             }
+ 
+             // æ·»åŠ æ–°é—®é¢˜åˆ°æœ€è¿‘é—®é¢˜åˆ—è¡¨
+             function addToRecentQuestions(question) {
+                 recentQuestionsArray = [question, ...recentQuestionsArray.filter(q => q !== question)]
+                     .slice(0, 5);
+                 localStorage.setItem('recentQuestions', JSON.stringify(recentQuestionsArray));
+                 updateRecentQuestions();
+             }
+ 
+             // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€è¿‘é—®é¢˜
+             updateRecentQuestions();
+ 
+             // æ·»åŠ æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ°èŠå¤©ç•Œé¢
+             function addMessage(content, isUser = false) {
+                 const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
+                 messageDiv.className = `message ${isUser ? 'user' : 'ai'}`;
+                 messageDiv.innerHTML = `
+                     <div class="message-content">
+                         ${isUser ? content : marked.parse(content)}
+                     </div>
+                 `;
+                 chatMessages.insertBefore(messageDiv, typingIndicator);
+                 chatMessages.scrollTop = chatMessages.scrollHeight;
+             }
+ 
+             // å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
+             async function sendMessage(message) {
+                 if (!message.trim()) return;
+ 
+                 // æ˜¾ç¤ºç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯
+                 addMessage(message, true);
+                 addToRecentQuestions(message);
+ 
+                 // æ¸…ç©ºè¾“å…¥æ¡†å¹¶ç¦ç”¨
+                 messageInput.value = '';
+                 messageInput.disabled = true;
+                 sendButton.disabled = true;
+ 
+                 // æ˜¾ç¤ºæ­£åœ¨è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨
+                 typingIndicator.style.display = 'block';
+ 
+                 try {
+                     // è°ƒç”¨API
+                     const response = await fetch('/api/course/ai/chat', {
+                         method: 'POST',
+                         headers: {
+                             'Content-Type': 'application/json',
+                         },
+                         body: JSON.stringify({ message })
+                     });
+ 
+                     const data = await response.json();
+ 
+                     if (data.success) {
+                         // æ˜¾ç¤ºAIå›å¤
+                         addMessage(data.reply);
+                     } else {
+                         addMessage('æŠ±æ­‰ï¼Œæˆ‘é‡åˆ°äº†ä¸€äº›é—®é¢˜ã€‚è¯·ç¨åå†è¯•ã€‚');
+                     }
+                 } catch (error) {
+                     console.error('Error:', error);
+                     addMessage('æŠ±æ­‰ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯ã€‚è¯·ç¨åå†è¯•ã€‚');
+                 } finally {
+                     // éšè—æ­£åœ¨è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨
+                     typingIndicator.style.display = 'none';
+                     // é‡æ–°å¯ç”¨è¾“å…¥
+                     messageInput.disabled = false;
+                     sendButton.disabled = false;
+                     messageInput.focus();
+                 }
+             }
+ 
+             // å‘é€æŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
+             sendButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                 sendMessage(messageInput.value);
+             });
+ 
+             // è¾“å…¥æ¡†å›è½¦äº‹ä»¶
+             messageInput.addEventListener('keypress', (e) => {
+                 if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
+                     e.preventDefault();
+                     sendMessage(messageInput.value);
+                 }
+             });
+ 
+             // æ¨èé—®é¢˜ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
+             document.querySelectorAll('.suggestion-item').forEach(item => {
+                 item.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                     const question = item.getAttribute('data-question');
+                     messageInput.value = question;
+                     sendMessage(question);
+                 });
+             });
+         });
+     </script>
+ </body>
+ 
+ </html>
+ 
```

```diff
+                         <!-- é¢„è§ˆå†…å®¹å°†é€šè¿‡JavaScriptåŠ¨æ€æ›´æ–° -->

+     </main>

+     <!-- Bootstrap JS -->
+     <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/bootstrap/5.3.0/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
+     <!-- Marked.js -->
+     <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/marked/4.0.2/marked.min.js"></script>
+     <!-- EasyMDE -->
+     <script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/easymde/2.18.0/easymde.min.js"></script>
+     <!-- è‡ªå®šä¹‰JS -->
+     <script>
+         // åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¼–è¾‘å™¨
+         const easyMDE = new EasyMDE({
+             element: document.getElementById('markdownEditor'),
+             autofocus: true,
+             spellChecker: false,
+             status: false,
+             toolbar: [
+                 'bold', 'italic', 'heading', '|',
+                 'quote', 'unordered-list', 'ordered-list', '|',
+                 'link', 'image', 'code', '|',
+                 'preview', 'side-by-side', 'fullscreen'
+             ]
+         });
+ 
+         // è·å–DOMå…ƒç´ 
+         const notesList = document.getElementById('notesList');
+         const noteTitle = document.getElementById('noteTitle');
+         const previewPanel = document.getElementById('previewPanel');
+         const newNoteBtn = document.getElementById('newNoteBtn');
+         const saveNoteBtn = document.getElementById('saveNoteBtn');
+ 
+         // å½“å‰ç¬”è®°ID
+         let currentNoteId = null;
+ 
+         // ä»localStorageåŠ è½½ç¬”è®°
+         function loadNotes() {
+             const notes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('notes') || '[]');
+             notesList.innerHTML = notes.map(note => `
+                 <div class="note-item ${note.id === currentNoteId ? 'active' : ''}" 
+                      data-id="${note.id}">
+                     <h6 class="mb-1">${note.title || 'æœªå‘½åç¬”è®°'}</h6>
+                     <small class="text-muted">${new Date(note.lastModified).toLocaleString()}</small>
+                 </div>
+             `).join('');
+ 
+             // æ·»åŠ ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
+             document.querySelectorAll('.note-item').forEach(item => {
+                 item.addEventListener('click', () => loadNote(item.dataset.id));
+             });
+         }
+ 
+         // åŠ è½½å•ä¸ªç¬”è®°
+         function loadNote(id) {
+             const notes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('notes') || '[]');
+             const note = notes.find(n => n.id === id);
+             if (note) {
+                 currentNoteId = id;
+                 noteTitle.value = note.title;
+                 easyMDE.value(note.content);
+                 updatePreview();
+                 loadNotes(); // åˆ·æ–°åˆ—è¡¨ä»¥æ›´æ–°activeçŠ¶æ€
+             }
+         }
+ 
+         // ä¿å­˜ç¬”è®°
+         function saveNote() {
+             const notes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('notes') || '[]');
+             const title = noteTitle.value.trim();
+             const content = easyMDE.value();
+ 
+             if (currentNoteId) {
+                 // æ›´æ–°ç°æœ‰ç¬”è®°
+                 const index = notes.findIndex(n => n.id === currentNoteId);
+                 if (index !== -1) {
+                     notes[index] = {
+                         ...notes[index],
+                         title,
+                         content,
+                         lastModified: Date.now()
+                     };
+                 }
+             } else {
+                 // åˆ›å»ºæ–°ç¬”è®°
+                 currentNoteId = Date.now().toString();
+                 notes.push({
+                     id: currentNoteId,
+                     title,
+                     content,
+                     created: Date.now(),
+                     lastModified: Date.now()
+                 });
+             }
+ 
+             localStorage.setItem('notes', JSON.stringify(notes));
+             loadNotes();
+         }
+ 
+         // æ›´æ–°é¢„è§ˆ
+         function updatePreview() {
+             const content = easyMDE.value();
+             previewPanel.innerHTML = marked.parse(content);
+         }
+ 
+         // æ–°å»ºç¬”è®°
+         newNoteBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
+             currentNoteId = null;
+             noteTitle.value = '';
+             easyMDE.value('');
+             updatePreview();
+             loadNotes();
+         });
+ 
+         // ä¿å­˜ç¬”è®°
+         saveNoteBtn.addEventListener('click', saveNote);
+ 
+         // å®æ—¶é¢„è§ˆ
+         easyMDE.codemirror.on('change', updatePreview);
+ 
+         // åˆå§‹åŒ–åŠ è½½
+         loadNotes();
+     </script>
+ </body>
+ 
+ </html> 
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE notes (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    user_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE notes (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    user_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
```

```diff

+ package com.zhimiao.model;
+ 
+ import jakarta.persistence.*;
+ import lombok.Data;
+ import java.time.LocalDateTime;
+ 
+ @Data
+ @Entity
+ @Table(name = "notes")
+ public class Note {
+     @Id
+     @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)
+     private Long id;
+ 
+     @Column(name = "user_id", nullable = false)
+     private Long userId;
+ 
+     @Column(name = "title")
+     private String title;
+ 
+     @Column(name = "content", columnDefinition = "TEXT")
+     private String content;
+ 
+     @Column(name = "created_at")
+     private LocalDateTime createdAt;
+ 
+     @Column(name = "updated_at")
+     private LocalDateTime updatedAt;
+ 
+     @PrePersist
+     protected void onCreate() {
+         createdAt = LocalDateTime.now();
+         updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();
+     }
+ 
+     @PreUpdate
+     protected void onUpdate() {
+         updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();
+     }
+ } 
```

éœ€è¦æ·»åŠ Lombokä¾èµ–ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä¿®æ”¹pom.xmlï¼š

```diff
+ package com.zhimiao.repository;
+ 
+ import com.zhimiao.model.Note;
+ import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;
+ import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;
+ import java.util.List;
+ 
+ @Repository
+ public interface NoteRepository extends JpaRepository<Note, Long> {
+     List<Note> findByUserIdOrderByUpdatedAtDesc(Long userId);
+     List<Note> findByUserIdAndTitleContainingOrderByUpdatedAtDesc(Long userId, String title);
+ } 
```

```diff

+ package com.zhimiao.service;
+ 
+ import com.zhimiao.model.Note;
+ import com.zhimiao.repository.NoteRepository;
+ import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
+ import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
+ import org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;
+ 
+ import java.util.List;
+ import java.util.Optional;
+ 
+ @Service
+ public class NoteService {
+     
+     @Autowired
+     private NoteRepository noteRepository;
+ 
+     @Transactional(readOnly = true)
+     public List<Note> getNotesByUserId(Long userId) {
+         return noteRepository.findByUserIdOrderByUpdatedAtDesc(userId);
+     }
+ 
+     @Transactional(readOnly = true)
+     public List<Note> searchNotes(Long userId, String query) {
+         return noteRepository.findByUserIdAndTitleContainingOrderByUpdatedAtDesc(userId, query);
+     }
+ 
+     @Transactional(readOnly = true)
+     public Optional<Note> getNoteById(Long id) {
+         return noteRepository.findById(id);
+     }
+ 
+     @Transactional
+     public Note createNote(Note note) {
+         return noteRepository.save(note);
+     }
+ 
+     @Transactional
+     public Note updateNote(Note note) {
+         return noteRepository.save(note);
+     }
+ 
+     @Transactional
+     public void deleteNote(Long id) {
+         noteRepository.deleteById(id);
+     }
+ } 
```

---

æœ€ååˆ›å»ºControllerå±‚ï¼š

---

```diff
- 
+ package com.zhimiao.controller;
+ 
+ import com.zhimiao.model.Note;
+ import com.zhimiao.service.NoteService;
+ import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
+ import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
+ import org.springframework.security.core.Authentication;
+ import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;
+ 
+ import java.util.List;
+ 
+ @RestController
+ @RequestMapping("/api/notes")
+ @CrossOrigin(origins = "*", allowedHeaders = "*")
+ public class NoteController {
+ 
+     @Autowired
+     private NoteService noteService;
+ 
+     @GetMapping
+     public ResponseEntity<List<Note>> getNotes(Authentication authentication) {
+         Long userId = getUserIdFromAuthentication(authentication);
+         return ResponseEntity.ok(noteService.getNotesByUserId(userId));
+     }
+ 
+     @GetMapping("/search")
+     public ResponseEntity<List<Note>> searchNotes(
+             Authentication authentication,
+             @RequestParam String query) {
+         Long userId = getUserIdFromAuthentication(authentication);
+         return ResponseEntity.ok(noteService.searchNotes(userId, query));
+     }
+ 
+     @GetMapping("/{id}")
+     public ResponseEntity<Note> getNoteById(
+             Authentication authentication,
+             @PathVariable Long id) {
+         return noteService.getNoteById(id)
+                 .map(ResponseEntity::ok)
+                 .orElse(ResponseEntity.notFound().build());
+     }
+ 
+     @PostMapping
+     public ResponseEntity<Note> createNote(
+             Authentication authentication,
+             @RequestBody Note note) {
+         note.setUserId(getUserIdFromAuthentication(authentication));
+         return ResponseEntity.ok(noteService.createNote(note));
+     }
+ 
+     @PutMapping("/{id}")
+     public ResponseEntity<Note> updateNote(
+             Authentication authentication,
+             @PathVariable Long id,
+             @RequestBody Note note) {
+         Long userId = getUserIdFromAuthentication(authentication);
+         return noteService.getNoteById(id)
+                 .filter(n -> n.getUserId().equals(userId))
+                 .map(existingNote -> {
+                     note.setId(id);
+                     note.setUserId(userId);
+                     return ResponseEntity.ok(noteService.updateNote(note));
+                 })
+                 .orElse(ResponseEntity.notFound().build());
+     }
+ 
+     @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
+     public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteNote(
+             Authentication authentication,
+             @PathVariable Long id) {
+         Long userId = getUserIdFromAuthentication(authentication);
+         return noteService.getNoteById(id)
+                 .filter(note -> note.getUserId().equals(userId))
+                 .map(note -> {
+                     noteService.deleteNote(id);
+                     return ResponseEntity.ok().<Void>build();
+                 })
+                 .orElse(ResponseEntity.notFound().build());
+     }
+ 
+     private Long getUserIdFromAuthentication(Authentication authentication) {
+         // è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ ¹æ®ä½ çš„ç”¨æˆ·è®¤è¯å®ç°æ¥è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ID
+         // ç¤ºä¾‹å®ç°ï¼Œå®é™…åº”è¯¥æ ¹æ®ä½ çš„ç”¨æˆ·ç³»ç»Ÿæ¥å®ç°
+         return 1L; // ä¸´æ—¶è¿”å›å›ºå®šå€¼ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ ¹æ®å®é™…æƒ…å†µä¿®æ”¹
+     }
+ } 
```

```diff
  /**
-  * ç¬”è®°APIæ¨¡å—
+  * æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨ç¬”è®°ç®¡ç†ç±»
+  */
+ class NoteStorage {
+     constructor() {
+         this.storageKey = 'zhimiao_notes';
+         this.notes = this.loadNotes();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ä»localStorageåŠ è½½ç¬”è®°
+      */
+     loadNotes() {
+         const notesJson = localStorage.getItem(this.storageKey);
+         return notesJson ? JSON.parse(notesJson) : [];
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ä¿å­˜ç¬”è®°åˆ°localStorage
+      */
+     saveNotes() {
+         localStorage.setItem(this.storageKey, JSON.stringify(this.notes));
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç”Ÿæˆå”¯ä¸€ID
+      */
+     generateId() {
+         return Date.now().toString(36) + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ç¬”è®°
+      */
+     getAllNotes() {
+         return this.notes;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–å•ä¸ªç¬”è®°
+      */
+     getNote(id) {
+         return this.notes.find(note => note.id === id);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆ›å»ºæ–°ç¬”è®°
+      */
+     createNote(noteData) {
+         const note = {
+             id: this.generateId(),
+             title: noteData.title || 'æ— æ ‡é¢˜',
+             content: noteData.content || '',
+             createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
+             updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
+         };
+         this.notes.unshift(note);
+         this.saveNotes();
+         return note;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°ç¬”è®°
+      */
+     updateNote(id, noteData) {
+         const index = this.notes.findIndex(note => note.id === id);
+         if (index === -1) return null;
+ 
+         const note = this.notes[index];
+         Object.assign(note, {
+             ...noteData,
+             updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
+         });
+         this.saveNotes();
+         return note;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆ é™¤ç¬”è®°
+      */
+     deleteNote(id) {
+         const index = this.notes.findIndex(note => note.id === id);
+         if (index === -1) return false;
+         
+         this.notes.splice(index, 1);
+         this.saveNotes();
+         return true;
+     }
+ }
```
